identity.mission: Create a 'Private Knowledge Vault' that feels like a high-end fintech tool mixed with a futuristic library. Secure, fast, and beautiful.
identity.vibe: The Obsidian Vault. Dark, crystalline, precise.
identity.emotional_archetype: The Performance Pro (Elite, Precise, Dark Mode native)

rules.classes: font-mono text-xs bg-muted/50 px-1 py-0.5 rounded text-accent-foreground

usage_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use #02040A for background.
Use 'Electric Blue' (#3B82F6) ONLY for primary actions (Ask, Upload).
Glassmorphism is MANDATORY for the 'Source Panel' and 'Ask Input' container.

textures.noise: url('data:image/svg+xml,...') (Optional subtle noise overlay for 'paper' feel in document view)

dashboard.grid_classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-6

results_page.mobile_structure: Stack: Answer top, Sources collapsible bottom.

GlassCard.description: The fundamental building block. Dark, frosted, subtle border.
GlassCard.base_classes: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md p-6 transition-all hover:border-white/20 hover:shadow-neon

GlowButton.base_classes: relative inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-primary px-8 py-3 text-sm font-medium text-white transition-all hover:bg-primary/90 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-background

SourcePill.base_classes: inline-flex items-center gap-1 rounded-full border border-white/10 bg-white/5 px-2 py-1 text-xs text-muted-foreground hover:bg-white/10 hover:text-white transition-colors cursor-pointer

micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click.
Upload zone pulses when dragging file.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: First, install 'framer-motion' and 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in 'colors.tailwind_config_extension'.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css and apply the base font families.
4. LAYOUT: Create a reusable 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar (glassmorphic) and main content area.
6. QUALITY: Every interactive element must have a hover state. Use the 'GlassCard' style for all content containers.
7. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Ask' interface feels fast. Use optimistic UI updates where possible.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Do NOT use gradients for text (accessibility issue).
Keep the backend interaction simple, focus on the Frontend Polish.
